website_summaries.verdict: This affordable backpack is built with a pocket to help keep your school laptop safe.
pros: Includes a padded and zippered area to keep a laptop safe
Includes two side pockets for extra storage
Extra padding on the shoulder straps for greater comfort
Also a handy backpack for travel
cons: This model is lacking some extra pockets available on other more expensive Eastport models

customer_reviews.title: Good quality, good price
customer_reviews.text: This backpack seems very well made. The zippers work well, as do the straps in terms of durability and ease in adjusting length. The color and design are sharp and look of good quality. It is light enough for my kindergartner to carry, although it's pretty big on her. Both larger pockets have plenty of space for binders, computers, etc. You could easily fit a laptop in this, although it is a standard backpack so it doesn't have any extra padding that might protect a computer.
customer_reviews.author: ali trueblood

customer_reviews.title: Super cute and durable backpack!
customer_reviews.text: Super cute back pack. Made well. It even is made out of material that can be wiped off easily.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great backpack for 10 year old boy
customer_reviews.text: Great backpack for 10 year old boy. Lightweight and surprisingly durable. Has held up to transporting workbooks, school supplies, and some textbooks. It is roomy and looks like it could be used for an older boy as well.
customer_reviews.author: gottaread

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!!
customer_reviews.text: LOVE THIS BACKPACK!! You couldn't get a backpack this good for this price anywhere else.
customer_reviews.author: EmmiLee

customer_reviews.title: So cute
customer_reviews.text: Love this bookbag for my daughter! So cute and holds up well.
customer_reviews.author: Katie Gardner

customer_reviews.title: This is a very well made backpack with plenty of ...
customer_reviews.text: This is a very well made backpack with plenty of space for a young teenager to carry her items to and from school.
customer_reviews.author: Suziles71

customer_reviews.title: Nice backpack
customer_reviews.text: Heavy duty, has withstood what my daughter has put it through!
customer_reviews.author: William Jenkins

customer_reviews.title: its cheap....but...
customer_reviews.text: Too bulky and its starts showing signs of wear and tear. But guess thats the price for shopping too close to economical
customer_reviews.author: malveth

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: My girls volleyball team love this backpack. This is the second time I've ordered this backpack.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Kaaa

customer_reviews.title: Great product.
customer_reviews.text: Its Great just as Big as i needed it. My Son Loves it.
customer_reviews.author: LaCeda Jones

customer_reviews.title: Made for a perfect Christmas present!
customer_reviews.text: My significant other loved this back pack! His favorite color is orange and this wasn't to orange lol the bag is big with lots of room. He likes the shoe bag too.
customer_reviews.author: jenn87m

customer_reviews.title: Great buy!
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what my son needed for all his books. Holding up very well and it has plenty of space for all his books, laptop, and more.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: Best Backpack (especially for the price)
customer_reviews.text: I got this backpack after a different, far more expensive, backpack of mine started falling apart after just a few months of use. I'm a college student and I use this backpack every day to haul around all my electronics and books and I'm very impressed at the quality. Not one stitch has broken and all the zippers work fabulously. The backpack is plenty spacious, but not to big for everyday use. There are lots of inner and outer pockets, some mesh, which I find really convenient for storing my pens and charging wires. The backpack is very well made and easy to organize, I would totally recommend it to a friend.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: Eastsport Everyday Classic Backpack with Interior Tech Sleeve
product_meta.description: Be the center of attention all-year-round with the Eastsport Everyday Classic Backpack with Interior Tech Sleeve. This bag is equipped with a front easy access zip pocket, an oversized main compartment with interior laptop sleeve, and further accented with fun colors and prints. Designed with an ultra roomy interior, this bag with its soft-hand feel polyester, was designed with YOU in mind hitting all the right notes anywhere and everywhere you go.
feature_bullets: Spacious Main Compartment with interior secure sleeve that protects your device on the go (up to 15" laptop/tablet)
Front Zippered Compartment and Easy Access Front Pocket for ultimate organization; Two Side Pockets for easy hydration on the go
Padded Back ensures your back will be comfortable and cool; Comfort Rubberized Top Handle; Ultra Padded Adjustable Shoulder Straps
Made our of durable and light weight water resistant polyester material
MSRP $39.99; Limited Lifetime Guarantee; Dimensions: 17.5 by 12 by 8 Inches
